titleStmt.title: The passion of our blessed Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ: or, Cries of the Son of God Digested from the works of the late Reverend Dr. Horneck. Licens'd and enter'd according to order.
titleStmt.author: Horneck, Anthony, 1641-1697.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for S. Bates in Gilt-spur-street,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The cry of the Son of God.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
